Anuradhapura is considered to have the known history from thousands of years. It is an archeological city nin Sri Lanka listed as World Heritage Site by UNESCO. This trip is ideal for a nice weekend and to explore the great sites in and around Anuradhapura.

Valparaíso is the main port of Chile, as well as one of the most important cities in the country, due to the number of inhabitants and its architectural and human heritage. It was declared a World Heritage Site by UNESCO. To learn more about the port (you can read more in Wikipedia).

Located along the Douro river estuary in Northern Portugal, Porto is the second largest city in the country and one of the oldest European centres. Its historical core was proclaimed a World Heritage Site by UNESCO in 1996.
